meanings.definition: The position or role of a commissioner.
meanings.sent1: Her commissionerships involved overseeing various projects in the city.
meanings.sent2: The board meeting was attended by all the commissionerships.
meanings.sent3: The commissionerships had a tough time deciding on the new budget.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, her commissionerships were like captains of different ships.
meanings.sent5: The responsibilities of her commissionerships weighed heavily on her shoulders.

meanings.sent1: The commissionerships gathered to discuss the upcoming policy changes.
meanings.sent2: The effectiveness of the commissionerships depended on their ability to work together.
meanings.sent3: During the annual retreat, the commissionerships enjoyed team-building activities.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the commissionerships was crucial for making important decisions.
meanings.sent5: The diversity within the commissionerships brought different perspectives to the table.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a commissioner.
meanings.sent1: His commissionerships lasted for five years before he decided to retire.
meanings.sent2: The commissionerships were up for re-election at the end of the year.
meanings.sent3: The commissionerships eagerly awaited the results of the election.
meanings.sent4: The commissionerships' term was marked by significant changes in the department.
meanings.sent5: The commissionerships' dedication to their duties was evident throughout their term.
